site_name: VANDERBILT UNIVERSITY VICE PROVOST FOR RESEARCH

citations.narrative:
The IACUC approved two exceptions to the Animal Welfare Act (AWA) Regulations and Standards in protocol M1800116
that were specified and explained by the principal investigator in the protocol. A summary of one of the exceptions,
allowing forced exercise of test sheep to study an animal's response to increased exercise demand, was not attached to
the facility's Fiscal Year 2023 annual report. The annual report must be complete and accurate to assure the public and
other stakeholders that the facility is adhering to the standards and regulations under the AWA. The facility shall submit a
corrected FY 2023 Annual Report to include a summary of all IACUC approved exceptions. Correct by 9/27/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Attending Veterinarian, the Director of OAWA and other facility
representatives.
n

narrative:
2.36(b)(3) 
   
Annual report. 
The IACUC approved two exceptions to the Animal Welfare Act (AWA) Regulations and Standards in protocol M1800116 
that were specified and explained by the principal investigator in the protocol. A summary of one of the exceptions, 
allowing forced exercise of test sheep to study an animal's response to increased exercise demand, was not attached to 
the facility's Fiscal Year 2023 annual report. The annual report must be complete and accurate to assure the public and 
other stakeholders that the facility is adhering to the standards and regulations under the AWA. The facility shall submit a 
corrected FY 2023 Annual Report to include a summary of all IACUC approved exceptions. Correct by 9/27/24. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Attending Veterinarian, the Director of OAWA and other facility 
representatives.
